column1: Art Institute of Chicago////One or two summers ago
column2: I went to the Art Institute with a friend of mine. Since she had a membership we didn't have to pay much for the museum itself
column4: I covered that since using the park whiz service saved me money and time when it came to finding a place for my car
column5: since I could pay for parking before going to the Art Institute. We basically spent the whole day there
column7: including a presentation on industrial design in Europe. There were also several suits of armor and artifacts from antiquity
column8: which was the coolest part for me! I saw that it makes sense to get a museum membership if you come there a lot
column9: but since I'm not that much of an art guy
column10: I'm willing to pay a little more when I come there on my own. Overall
column11: the Art Institute is a very fun place to spend a hot summer day.
